lead_paragraph: The Memphis Grizzlies signed forward-center Darko Milicic, the No. 2 overall pick in the 2003 draft. Terms were not disclosed. Milicic averaged 8 points and 5.5 rebounds last season for the Orlando Magic, which allowed him to leave to clear room for Rashard Lewis’s signing.
